sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be open on 2/22 and 2/23.  Golf course and Shelden Trails are currently groomed.  Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 22, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  For today, February 22, 2025 grooming for classic ski and skate ski will take place on Coyote Run and while Cedar Trace will be groomed for classic skiing.  Due to deteriorating conditions Hawk Hills will not be groom today.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The HM website is not correct.  They did groom the entire golf course including hawk hills for skating.  The tracks also look decent with a few grass spots here and there.  It’s great conditions on the skate deck.  I skied from 9-10am

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Skied Stony Creek late in the afternoon on Friday 2/21.  The Golf Course trails to the East of the parking lot was rolled and classic tracks groomed.  They generally groom early on Saturdays for weekend visitors.  Snow was equal to the best you will see in SE lower MI.  Did not ski the trails in the woods West of the parking lot.The park closes at 8:00 PM, so it might be possible to get in some night skiing.  Warmer temps and rain are coming.  Enjoy Stony Creek NOW>

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs trails are firm and fast , beautifully groomed and ready for a premium weekend . LF 7 today .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 lifts, Rope Tow, and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Conditions continue to be mid-winter excellent for skiing and snowboarding at Nub's Nob. The machine groomed snow looks fantastic this morning thanks to our dedicated Grooming Crew. Pintail Peak Lodge is open today with a deli and an espresso bar. NASTAR Racing is from 12:30 to 2:30 PM on Birch Run. Please sign-up at the front desk. The Tweed Tones will play outside in the Winter Garden at 3:30 PM. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
